attributes.action: Overpriced UK Hotel Quarantine charges with no basic Facility Hygiene/Food/room.
attributes.additional_details: These Schema is planned and actioned by UK Gov. We would request UK government to Revisit the UK hotel quarantine charges and provide basic Facilities to guests w.r.t ( Hygine/Food Quality/Room) those Hotel for the Guests. Address the concern and issues faced by Many Guest while there quarantine stay.
attributes.background:
Many Guest have faced below issues while there stay period:
-Hygiene issue in Hotel Rooms Dampness,Mold etc
-Food provided is of poor quality and non-nutritious
-For Couple with Toddlers no access to prepare baby food
-Poor Guest service for any personal needs.
-Inadequate room type for Family

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575118
